storyInfo: Malkiewicz is unable to tolerate the release of Brassrust, and finally decides to wield his authority. At the same time, the Armorless Union leads a purge of the Infected, but Młynar's obstruction brings an end to the Lazurite's plans.

attributes.content: Doctor?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: You know, you've been frowning ever since you came back from the restaurant.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: If you're feeling worn out, then I'd be more than glad to––
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: What'd you think of the meal?;What do you think of Malkiewicz?

attributes.content: It went well. You're getting pretty slick around these kinds of events, aren't you?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I can tell. Even though the directors didn't show up in person, those corporate execs are all fond of you...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I said it already, but a certain spokesman took the fall and resigned over the Radiant Knight incident.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Malkiewicz was given that position in turn, but before that, he was a complete nobody, a minor player at best.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Though he still has a bit of that unvarnished human touch... I don't think it'll last very long in the environment he's in.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Do you think Rhodes Island's plan is feasible?

attributes.content: Let's set that aside for now... So, do you really trust me?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: The infiltration of the General Chamber isn't some kind of conspiracy. In the face of money and a changing society, even if the K.G.C.C. did nothing, the knights would still fall to capital.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: The courtesy that the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi has extended to Rhodes Island is almost certainly linked to the Radiant Knight. That being the case, should a person as particular as you... inadvertently fail to return that courtesy, you'll be the one to suffer.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Thanks for the warning.;That much I already know.
So, what are you thinking?;What should I do then?

attributes.content: Brassrust Knight... is going to fight again?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes... Based on video evidence and the testimonies from other knights, the Knights Association proved to the National Council that what happened to that Infected was an exacerbation of his disease due to excessive casting.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Because the cause of death was 'Oripathy,' Brassrust Knight was not directly responsible, so...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Even if that was the case... then we should at least...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Leave me.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Put me through to the associate justice of the National Council... on a private line.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.text: The busy tone rings out twice from the phone.
Malkiewicz suddenly flashes back to his childhood, to the copper-colored telephone that sat on the desk in his father's study.

attributes.content: Spokesman, have you come up with a solution?
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: As long as Mr. Czarny no longer has the evidence, it's fine, right?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Of course... But as a friendly reminder, if this goes public late, we will both end up taking the blame.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Therefore, the safest option... is to get rid of him.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: You have my assurances.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: My assurances... that I can keep Mr. Czarny muzzled.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: There's no need to concern yourself with my methods.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Very well then... As long as you can demonstrate your sincerity.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Tomorrow, I will begin the retrial of Olmer Ingra's case. If you can do that within seven days...
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Olmer Ingra will thence disappear from the Major.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: ...I will.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Right. At the very least, you must prove to me that Mr. Czarny truly 'would never betray us.'
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.text: Malkiewicz remembers. He remembers that bronze-colored telephone.
Telephones were not as popular back then, and cables still coursed above bars, hostels, and roaring construction sites.
When it rang, it would bring joys and sorrows alike.
That was life in Kazimierz... Life in modernity.

attributes.content: There's one thing I hope you understand...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You're provoking a spokesman.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You know as well as I do that I'm only a stand-in. I enjoy no support among the Board of Directors.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But that does not mean that I will abide your butchery.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The power to command the Armorless Union... was once in the hands of Mr. Czarny. And now...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Please don't mistake my intentions. I'm not trying to challenge your authority.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I'm simply reminding you.. to make sure our future cooperation goes smoothly.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: After all you've said, it wouldn't behoove me to run amok. That would be too discourteous after all.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: All I need is your assurance. Olmer Ingra is just another corrupt noble, and it hardly makes sense for someone like that to get in the way of our relationship, yes?
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Then, there's nothing more for us to talk about.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Wait! Hold on, Mr. Malkiewicz, please––
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: You smiled.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Woah! Mr. McKee, when did you...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I've never seen you smile like that before, my man.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Did you need something?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Naturally, the Armorless Union has already received their orders, and we still have a role to play in these matters. However...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Actually, never mind. Carry on with your work.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Alright, Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Authority is the sweetest taste. Wouldn't you agree, Mr. Malkiewicz?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Nothing beats strolling through these streets in the evening.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: As long as there's no work to be done, that is.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Reporting. Monique has led her team to the designated location.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: The target of this operation has been confirmed, and there are now about a hundred Infected hidden throughout the area.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Ah. Score whatever kills you can. As I said before, the pay is determined by headcount.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Same old rules apply, no friendly fire.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Yessir.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Hey, hey! We've got Armorless!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight A

attributes.content: Wh-What? You're kidding, right? This is the middle of Kawalerielki! They wouldn't dare start a bloodbath?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight B

attributes.content: Not enough.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: What? Wasn't Wild Mane supposed to distract the Armorless like you wanted?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: But, it's not enough.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Did we overlook something...?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Prepare for the worst, Fartooth.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Don't underestimate the Armorless.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Run, run now!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight A

attributes.content: Calm down. What did you see?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight B

attributes.content: B-B-Blue... A blue bow.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight A

attributes.content: Huh?! You're kidding!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight A

attributes.content: H-Hurry, tell the others, spread out and run! Hide in the garbage dumps if you have to!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight A

attributes.content: Tell the Infected civilans to not resist. They can't resist, no matter what––
attributes.name: An Infected Knight A

attributes.content: N-Now, if there's anyone who can contact Pinus Sylvestris... Please hurry...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight B

attributes.content: Haha... Ahahaha...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Reporting. We found three Infected.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Hahaha... Haha...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Right, did I tell you about the offer I got from the Board of Directors?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: 300 gold for an illegal Infected. Twice that for an Infected knight.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Dammit! They found me!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Each Infected is worth a ticket to the Major. An Infected knight is worth half a good car.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: So.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: How should we deal with a special individual who isn't in that price schedule?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: How many forms of code signing have you been trained in?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Um, I think I remember how to use three.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Hmm... Forget it. No need for any of that. If you see me... Mmm... Yes, snap my fingers.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If you see me snap my fingers, act immediately. No hesitation.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Yessir.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Alright. I'll head up to say hello.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.text: Lazurite Roy walks forward, and the street lights flicker several times.
The blue-brick road stretches forward, not a single person on the street.
There is a bench on the side of the desolate road.
And upon the bench sits a desolate person.

attributes.content: Good evening. And a wonderful one at that, yes?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Did you happen to see the news? Tonight, it's nothing but the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: This place sure is empty. Haven't seen anyone else around. I hear it hasn't been too peaceful around these parts either.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What are you doing here all by yourself?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Roy... I just finished work. Just resting here for a spell.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: My, did you only get off work just now, this late? What a workaholic.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But... What kind of work would you be doing around here?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The only folks around these parts are the Infected, illegal immigrants, and black market traffickers, right?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Just waiting for someone.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: What, are you even going to ask who I'm waiting for?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: No, no, no, why would I?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Waiting for someone, huh? Let me guess... you had a date with a beautiful lady? Haha, just kidding...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But, we both have business here.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I'm afraid I have to ask you and your friend to step aside.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You mind your business, I mind my business.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Do you have any idea what you're saying, Młynar?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Was I speaking Gaulish?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Oh, come on. If you're here, my underlings might slip up because they're so nervous.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Oh, Młynar, did you know... if I wanted to kill you right now... how little effort it'd take?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Roy slowly lifts his hand.
In the dark, the Armorless Union assassins wait, poised to strike.
Though perhaps nothing than a faulty premonition, the masters of hiding in the shadows always feel most prone to being seen.
Młynar Nearl.
They begin to pray, praying that Roy would not give any signals––
A white-horned Sarkaz with a sword.
*Sigh*...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: It really was... a beautiful lady, eh.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Am I late?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: What are you looking at me for?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Do your job, Roy.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Roy's eyes meet with those of the Sarkaz for a moment.
There is only one thing on his mind.
How to strike up a conversation later, without embarrassing himself too much.
Haha, I suddenly had a change of heart. Turns out it'll rain later tonight, and I happened to forget my umbrella.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Should I take this as evidence that the Nearl family intends to shelter the Infected?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Take it however you'd like.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Margaret won again.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You ought to stop her.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Forgive me.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But if that is what she wills, then I will support her... I will be her pillar.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You? You're a Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: As for the Infected situation, I'll assume you already contacted Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Your assistance is appreciated... The Armorless Union is a powerful enemy.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: If he insisted on slaughtering every Infected hiding in this area, I fear we would be powerless to stop him.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I just wanted to sit here.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Nothing more.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If you want to know what Margaret has been through the last few years, I'm willing to tell you what I know.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Of course, if you'd prefer to ask her yourself...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...I don't care.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I already understand, just from the look in her eyes.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Her mother and father, and even me in the past, all embraced that era of resplendence and glory.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You... are her true family.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You already know everything you need to know. From now on, I won't be lifting even a finger.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You can tell Margaret, and that... 'Rhodes Island.' Tell them beneath the glory-gilded exterior of the Grand Knight Territory... the extent of the rot on the inside.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: But a more practical suggestion I have is to leave the Grand Knight Territory as soon as possible. Leave Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Try your best to leave this entire era behind. That's probably one of the few right choices anyone can make.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: What a complicated person you are.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You... stay away from me!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Damnit, are you with the Armorless? You––
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: No, you're not... You're... a Sarkaz?! Who are you?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I come in peace. The Armorless Union has already left.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Wh-What are you talking about...?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Just now, just now, that Sarkaz blocked the Armorless...
attributes.name: An Infected Refugee

attributes.content: Just who are you? How do you have the guts to stand against them?
attributes.name: An Infected Refugee

attributes.content: I'm a physician for the Infected.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: A Sarkaz... who claims to treat the Infected? What...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: It's so crazy I can almost believe it.
attributes.name: An Infected Refugee

attributes.content: Fine then... So what do you want?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Kazimierz has the means to provide medical treatment to the Infected... That being the case, why do you still hide here, within the cracks of the city?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You're not from Kazimierz?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: No, this is something that even most people from Kazimierz wouldn't know... Wait, you said you're a physician for the Infected?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You... You're from Area 0?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I'm from a pharmaceutical company. This Area 0 that you mentioned... is that the place that shelters the Infected?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi Kazimierz has funded the establishment of a clinic hub specifically for the examination and treatment of Infected knights...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining is in no hurry to finish her sentence.
In the eyes of the Infected in front of her, she sees doubt, mistrust towards her, fear, and the slightest glimmer of hope.
You really aren't from Kazimierz... But that makes sense, they also hate the Sarkaz here. Ugh, sorry, but that's just how things are.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Do you treat the Infected over there?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Don't you think it's strange?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Such a big mobile platform has practically become a cage for the Infected knights. Did you know the Infected knights are examined and treated there, but they also 'live' there?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: As if existing like that can be called 'living' at all.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Alright, it seems you outsiders don't even know this much.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: But if all the Infected were to live there...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Then there's not enough space, right?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Those Infected who can still make money will step back into the arena, or carry on... finding whatever odd jobs they can.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: For those who can't become knights, they'll be sent to off to do some iffy work... Mining, transporting, all in dangerous environments.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: And if you get hurt, and you can't even do that kind of manual labor...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Take a guess, outsider. Where do you think those Infected from Area 0 end up?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You may think it's a hospital, and the knights may think it's a prison. But let me tell you, it is neither.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: The Infected are shipped there, washed of their dignity, stripped of their basic worth, and finally sent to the cutting boards to be culled.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: What you're looking at, Sarkaz, is a glorified slaughterhouse.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight
